title: i need some help if you can
body: so my account was hacked and the password changed so i can long in than my email get compromised so i cant change my password so i submitted a ticked but to look at my ticked i need to log into league of legends which i can't because i don't have the password the only reason i can post this is because i was logged in to the main website before i was hacked so i just stayed logged in. So if anyone has any tips i wold love it

replies.body:
It looks like you've received multiple messages from a recovery specialist already. Note that all interactions for an *account recovery* ticket will happen strictly via *email* instead of from our [Support Site](http://support.riotgames.com).

Let me know if you have any questions.
